game_meta.title: Oregon Ducks at Penn State Nittany Lions
game_meta.venue: West Shore Home Field at Beaver Stadium, University Park, PA

weather.notes: Light winds; minimal weather impact expected

hype_factors: Rematch of 2024 Big Ten title game

away.name: Oregon Ducks
away.recent_form: 4-game win streak; scoring ~48 PPG, allowing ~8 PPG

matchup_history.recent_trend: Split last two marquee meetings (1995 Rose Bowl, 2024 title game)

public_betting.note: Majority of tickets on Oregon despite PSU laying -3.5

odds.consensus_note: Market clustered at PSU -3.5 / 53.5; small RLM toward PSU with tickets on Oregon

key_trends: Line nudged from -3 to -3.5 toward PSU despite public on Oregon
situational_spots: White Out night-game boost for PSU
Oregon flying ~2,300 miles east; body-clock disadvantage

moneyline.rationale: Sharp-lean line move toward home; elite PSU defense in White Out
moneyline.value_assessment: Moderate value vs public Ducks tickets

spread.rationale: Market support at -3.5; defensive edge + home noise

total.rationale: Two top defenses; PSU likely to lean run and shorten game
total.value_assessment: Slight value after total ticked up

best_bet.rationale: Combines matchup edge and market signal without hook risk

injuries_news: Oregon RB Noah Whittington expected to return from 2-game absence
Oregon WR Justius Lowe trending toward available per midweek reports
matchup_notes: PSU’s #1 scoring defense vs Oregon’s top-10 scoring offense is the hinge matchup
GameDay in town; White Out crowd historically impacts cadence/communication
coaching_notes: Franklin’s Nittany Lions thrive at home at night; Ducks well-drilled under Lanning in hostile spots

excitement_factors.playoff_implications: Winner strengthens CFP resume; loser faces uphill climb
excitement_factors.conference_impact: Early Big Ten pecking-order clarifier with tiebreak stakes
excitement_factors.narrative: White Out revenge shot vs defending B1G champs
tv_storylines: Allar vs. Moore QB showcase under the lights
